alert.note: Alert for Citrus; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 24 at 5:17PM EDT until April 24 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Citrus County in west central Florida... Northeastern Sumter County in central Florida... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 517 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wildwood, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wildwood, Lake Panasoffkee, Center Hill, Coleman, Adamsville, and Sumterville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
